bibl.title: The 2005 Archaeological Season at El Hibeh, Beni Suef Governorate. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: Excavations of the University of California, Berkeley. See in part. p. 327: NGLP Salvage Excavations and Site Survey Finds of Mortuary Material [disturbed Late Roman / Coptic burials outside the city gate].
